alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Garland; Hot Spring; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:21AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Garland, eastern Montgomery and west central Hot Spring Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 420 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mauldin, or over Mount Ida, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs Village... Mount Ida... Mountain Pine... Meyers... Jessieville... Lake Ouachita State Park... Lofton... Mauldin... Rockwell... Avant... Bonnerdale... Mt Tabor... Fannie... Sunshine... Royal... Lena Landing Rec Area... Hamilton... Hempwallace... Story... Gibbs... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for central, western and southwestern Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Garland; Hot Spring; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations
